name: Sharing some <<Innocent Love>>
description:
As we dive into the development of a next "Super personal ID system". Our decentralized hash agglomerates the life long lived meta-tags, and the data is still managed by big centralized systems. We can only hope for the best of two worlds: Web1.0 decentralization & Web2.0 data management. Yet Rob Brezsny made a good point about optimism:
"cultivating the bright energy and practical love to fight with all our ingenuity against those who would degrade our beautiful world with their selfishness and cruelty and carelessness".

Where is the cryptography in this neo crypto world?

I share my selfie here as an attempt to share my love for these next A.I. to come. In the hope that they don´t render me as useless when the time arrives.
